titles.title: Fostering Secure Family Partnerships Act
Fostering Secure Family Partnerships Act
To support the ability of kinship caregivers to provide safety and stability for the children placed in their homes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Fostering Secure Family Partnerships Act
This bill increases payments to states for kinship navigator programs, which assist kinship caregivers in identifying and accessing services.
